00028 #ifndef ARCHIVEOPENER_HPP_
00029 #define ARCHIVEOPENER_HPP_
00030 
00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <cassert>
00033 
00034 #include "PetscTools.hpp"
00035 
00052 template <class Archive, class Stream>
00053 class ArchiveOpener
00054 {
00055 private:
00056     friend class TestArchivingHelperClasses;
00057 public:
00076     ArchiveOpener(const std::string& rDirectory,
00077                   const std::string& rFileName,
00078                   bool relativeToChasteTestOutput=true,
00079                   unsigned procId=PetscTools::GetMyRank());
00080 
00084     ~ArchiveOpener();
00085 
00089     Archive* GetCommonArchive()
00090     {
00091         assert(mpCommonArchive!=NULL);
00092         return mpCommonArchive;
00093     }
00094 private:
00096     Stream* mpCommonStream;
00098     Stream* mpPrivateStream;
00100     Archive* mpCommonArchive;
00102     Archive* mpPrivateArchive;
00103 };
